lead_paragraph: Investors shrugged off more sobering news about shaky government finances amid new signs that Asia’s economies are pushing ahead with their recovery.
snippet: Investors shrugged off more sobering news about shaky government finances amid new signs that Asia’s economies are pushing ahead with their recovery.

headline.main: On Quiet Day, Markets in Europe End Mixed
headline.seo: Global Equities Mixed on Quiet Day
headline.print_headline: Global Equities Are Mixed On Day of Quiet Dealings
